b:loop.values: data:labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) limit 18
data:labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) offset 17

label.expr:data-text: "+" + (data:labels count (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) - 17)

b:loop.values: data:labels where (l => l.name in data:defSource) limit 5
data:labels where (l => l.name in data:defSource) offset 4

b:class.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in [ "Fullpage" , "Label_2" ]))
b:class.name: singlePage

b:include.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in [ "Fullpage" , "Label_2" ]))
b:include.name: post-singlePage

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:if.cond: data:view.isPost and data:post.labels none (label => label.name in data:defSource)

b:loop.values: data:post.labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType))

b:if.cond: !data:view.isPage and data:post.labels none (label => label.name in data:defAdsType)
data:view.isPost and data:post.labels none (label => label.name in data:defAdsType)
b:if.script: /**/ function get_text(el) {ret = ""; var length = el.childNodes.length; for(var i = 0; i < length; i++) {var node = el.childNodes[i]; if(node.nodeType != 8) {ret += node.nodeType != 1 ? node.nodeValue : get_text(node);} } return ret;} var words = get_text(document.getElementById('postBody')); var count = words.split(' ').length; var avg = 200; var counted = count / avg; var maincount = Math.round(counted); document.getElementById("readTime").innerHTML = maincount + " min read"; /**/

b:include.cond: data:view.url != data:blog.homepageUrl and data:view.url != data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical path "search"
b:include.name: postPagination.home

div.script: /**/ (function timeAgo(selector) { var templates = {prefix: "", suffix: " ago", seconds: "Seconds", minute: "Minute", minutes: "%d min", hour: "An hour", hours: "%d hours", day: "A day", days: "%d days", month: "A month", months: "%d months", year: "A year", years: "%d years"}; var template = function(t, n) { return templates[t] && templates[t].replace(/%d/i, Math.abs(Math.round(n))); }; var timer = function(time) { if (!time) return; time = time.replace(/\.\d+/, ""); time = time.replace(/-/, "/").replace(/-/, "/").replace("CH", "PM").replace("SA", "AM"); time = time.replace(/T/, " ").replace(/Z/, " UTC"); time = time.replace(/([\+\-]\d\d)\:?(\d\d)/, " $1$2"); time = new Date(time * 1000 || time); var now = new Date(); var seconds = ((now.getTime() - time) * .001) >> 0; var minutes = seconds / 60; var hours = minutes / 60; var days = hours / 24; var years = days / 365; return templates.prefix + ( seconds < 45 && template('seconds', seconds) || seconds < 90 && template('minute', 1) || minutes < 45 && template('minutes', minutes) || minutes < 90 && template('hour', 1) || hours < 24 && template('hours', hours) || hours < 42 && template('day', 1) || days < 30 && template('days', days) || days < 45 && template('month', 1) || days < 365 && template('months', days / 30) || years < 1.5 && template('year', 1) || template('years', years) ) + templates.suffix; }; var elements = document.getElementsByClassName('datetime'); for (var i in elements) { var $this = elements[i]; if (typeof $this === 'object') { $this.innerHTML = timer($this.getAttribute('data-datetime')); } } setTimeout(timeAgo, 60000); })(); /**/

b:if.script: /**/ document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { var a=document, b = a.getElementById("comment-editor"), d = b.getAttribute("data-src"); if (b.setAttribute("src", d), 1 == comment) { var f = a.getElementsByClassName("replyTo"), c = a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form"), h = f.length, k = function(b, d, e, f) { b.addEventListener("click", function() { var c = b.getAttribute("data-reply-to"); a.getElementById("c" + c).appendChild(d); a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form").className = 'comment-replybox-single'; a.getElementById("addcomment").className = 'commentsReply button outline'; e.src = f + "&parentID=" + c }) }; for (i = 0; i < h; i++) k(f[i], c, b, d); var l = a.getElementsByClassName("commentForm")[0]; a.getElementById("addcomment").addEventListener("click", function() { l.appendChild(c); a.getElementById("threaded-comment-form").className = 'comment-replybox-thread'; a.getElementById("addcomment").className = 'hidden'; b.src = d }) } }); /**/

div.script: /**/ function insertAfter(tbh,tgt) {var prt = tgt.parentNode; if (prt.lastChild == tgt) {prt.appendChild(tbh);} else {prt.insertBefore(tbh,tgt.nextSibling);}} var tgt = document.getElementById("postBody"); var midAd01 = document.getElementById("HTML01"); var showAd01 = tgt.getElementsByTagName("p"); if (showAd01.length > 0) {insertAfter(midAd01,showAd01[1]);}; /**/

/**/ function insertAfter(tbh,tgt) {var prt = tgt.parentNode; if (prt.lastChild == tgt) {prt.appendChild(tbh);} else {prt.insertBefore(tbh,tgt.nextSibling);}} var tgt = document.getElementById("postBody"); var midAd02 = document.getElementById("HTML02"); var showAd02 = tgt.getElementsByTagName("p"); if (showAd02.length > 0) {insertAfter(midAd02,showAd02[2]);}; /**/

b:with.value: data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:popularPostIds)

b:loop.values: data:labels where (l => l.name in data:defSource) limit 5
data:labels where (l => l.name in data:defSource) offset 4 limit 4
data:labels where (l => l.name in data:defSource) offset 4 limit 8
data:labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) limit 7
data:labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) offset 6 limit 6
data:labels where (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) offset 6 limit 12

label.expr:data-text: "+" + (data:labels count (l => (l.name not in data:defSource) and (l.name not in data:defBlogType) and (l.name not in data:defAdsType)) - 6)
